title: ID: humanist serif from Elle Decor
content:
Hello,

Can anyone ID this mystery typeface from Elle Decor? I know it is a humanist serif, but I have yet to find it on numerous type foundry sites...many thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gorgeous.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201758/http:/typophile.com/files/gorgeous_0.jpg) | 67.82 KB |
author: sara@vivevida.com

comments.content:
I have asked this question myself:

[http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/PoynterOSDisplay](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201758/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/PoynterOSDisplay "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/PoynterOSDisplay")

Mikey :-)
No way! That was fast. Mikey you are my hero. The dudes over at QBN couldn't get it... thanks so much!

You are so very welcome!!!

Enjoy,

Mikey :-)
